title: Santos Tour Down Under:  Sam Welsford Fends Off Caleb Ewan in Scorching Sprint
content:
'I didn't have the legs to come around him': Ewan stalls to fourth, with Bauhaus and Girmay finishing out the podium in the opening sprint.

Read the full article at Santos Tour Down Under: Sam Welsford Fends Off Caleb Ewan in Scorching Sprint on Velo.
author: ahood
